str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
